heading: Camera Integration in Rearview Mirror
paragraph: We wanted to integrate our solution seemlessly into existing car interiors without adding too much new hardware. Our solution only appends a small camera to the existing rearview mirror. The camera is used for handgesture recognition to enable the user to actively take decision and interact with the ADS.
